item.title: Jin Jiang International Hotels and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts have officially merged their loyalty programs
item.description:
Jin Jiang International Hotels from China and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts from Korea have joined their loyalty programs. Starting September 1st, members of Jin Jiang’s J-Club and Hanwha’s THE PLUS will share membership benefits. This includes perks like discounts on rooms, food, and beverages, as well as late check-outs and room upgrades at both hotel groups. J-Club’s over 14 million members will also have access to Hanwha’s resorts and golf courses across Korea...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/jin-jiang-international-hotels-and-hanwha-hotels-resorts-have-officially-merged-their-loyalty-programs/

item.title: Hawaiian Airlines and Air China have partnered on a codeshare agreement
item.description:
Hawaiian Airlines and Air China, China’s national airline, have partnered to provide travelers with expanded options and easier connections. This agreement comes after Hawaiian launched its new non-stop service to Beijing, operating three times a week. “We are thrilled to collaborate with Air China to expand our reach beyond Beijing, allowing our customers to conveniently explore more Chinese cities with a single ticket from Honolulu,” said Mark Dunkerley, Hawaiian Airlines President and CEO...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hawaiian-airlines-and-air-china-have-partnered-on-a-codeshare-agreement/

item.title: Entrepreneurs may find synergy in collaborating with larger corporations
item.description:
Large corporations are missing out on a $1.5 trillion global growth opportunity by not collaborating with entrepreneurs on digital innovation, reveals a new study by Accenture. This missed opportunity, representing 2.2% of global GDP, exists despite the fact that businesses of all sizes recognize the need for digital transformation. The report, “Harnessing the Power of Entrepreneurs to Open Innovation,” surveyed over 1,000 entrepreneurs and 1,000 large companies across G20 nations. Findings indicate that 82% of corporations acknowledge the learning potential startups offer in digital business transformation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/entrepreneurs-may-find-synergy-in-collaborating-with-larger-corporations/

item.title: Etihad, TCA Abu Dhabi, and Miral collaborate to showcase Abu Dhabi as a preferred destination
item.description:
Etihad Airways has partnered with the Abu Dhabi Tourism & Culture Authority (TCA Abu Dhabi) and Miral Asset Management (Miral) to enhance Abu Dhabi’s standing as a top global destination for tourism, business, and culture. This collaboration will see the three entities working together to attract more visitors and stopover travelers to Abu Dhabi. Joint efforts will include marketing and communication initiatives, sharing market insights and data, developing loyalty programs, and organizing business and leisure events both within the Emirate and internationally...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-tca-abu-dhabi-and-miral-collaborate-to-showcase-abu-dhabi-as-a-preferred-destination/

item.title: Twitter has revealed its inaugural collaboration with Singaporean musician @Sezairi
item.description:
● #SezairiQA and live songs on Twitter and Periscope @ 6:30pm on August 31, 2016 ● #SezairiLive debut show at Twitter APAC HQ in Singapore @ 7:30pm on September 2, 2016 ● Winners of @Sezairi photo caption contest get free tickets to #SezairiLive event Singaporean singer Sezairi (@Sezairi) will be performing live (#SezairiLive) on Twitter, Periscope, and at Twitter’s Asia Pacific headquarters. The performances follow a pre-listening party (#SezairiPreLP) on Twitter held the previous week...

item.title: Hotdesk and Compass provide short-term workspace solutions in the Asia Pacific region
item.description:
Hotdesk, a platform for finding temporary office space, has teamed up with Compass Offices to provide on-demand workspaces and meeting rooms for professionals on the move. These spaces can be reserved for various durations, including daily, weekly, or monthly. Studies from IDC indicate that by 2015, there will be a significant increase in the number of mobile workers globally, with over 1.3 billion individuals adopting this work style. Notably, the Asia Pacific region is projected to have the highest concentration, with over 838 million mobile workers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hotdesk-and-compass-provide-short-term-workspace-solutions-in-the-asia-pacific-region/

item.title: Users of Didi Kuaidi, GrabTaxi, Lyft, and Ola can now utilize their apps in different countries
item.description:
The concept of “roaming” has evolved from phone services to ATM cash withdrawals. Now, a partnership similar to the airline industry’s Star Alliance is bringing global roaming to ride-hailing apps that were once limited to specific regions. Didi Kuaidi, GrabTaxi, Lyft, and Ola have expanded their initial ride-sharing agreement, first established between Lyft and Didi Kuaidi in September. This expanded partnership now encompasses a significant portion of the world’s population, covering nearly all of Southeast Asia, India, China, and the United States...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/users-of-didi-kuaidi-grabtaxi-lyft-and-ola-can-now-utilize-their-apps-in-different-countries/
